posts.content:
I've been thinking about Character lately and wanted to get everyone's opinions.

What do you all think? Has anyone else had similar questions about Character?

posts.author: HomebrewHero
posts.content:
I think the RAW (Rules As Written) for Character are clear, but many DMs seem to interpret it differently.

In the new 2024 rules update, they changed how Character works. Now it's more streamlined but I'm not sure if it's better overall.

Our table uses a house rule for Character where we allow more flexibility in how it's applied. It's been working well so far.
